Porting Python Code 

Python 2                  Python 3
Print Statement           Print function
xrange()                  range()
long                      int
1/2 = 0                   1/2 = 0.5
ASCII Strings             Unicode Strings
String form %             {} String form format method
raw_input()               input()
except Ex, e              except Ex as e

http://getpython3.com/diveintopython3/
